§6§lA Review of Experimental Solubilities and a General Correlation between the Temperature-Dependent Solubility and Solute and Solvent Molar Masses for Binary n-Alkane Mixtures§r

§8§oSverre Gullikstad Johnsen§r

§72022§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oAccepted for publication in Fluid Phase Equilibria (Elsevier) in Jan. 2022. 16 pages, 6 figures (Fig.6 contains 43 subfigures). Published data for binary normal-alkane mixturesreviewed. 43 solute-solvent data-sets,
from 24 references are revisited. Linear regression used to establish a general correlation between solubility, solvent/solute molar masses and temperature\u00a7r
